mapper.select: SELECT sco.*, stu.stu_name, stu.stu_number, c.course_name, c.attribute, c.credit FROM score_info sco LEFT JOIN student_info stu ON sco.stu_id = stu.stu_id LEFT JOIN course_info c ON sco.course_id = c.course_id where stu.class_id = #{classId}
